dza yɛatse: na yeehu na yedzi ho dase
dza yɛdze hɛn enyiwa ehu: na yɛka onnyiewiei nkwa a ɔnye Egya no wɔ hɔ
dza yɛagyen hɛn enyiwa ahwɛ: na woyii no kyerɛɛ hɛn no no ho asɛm kyerɛ hom."

dza yɛatse: na yɛbɔ no dawur kyerɛ hom so
dza yɛdze hɛn enyiwa ehu: ama hom so nye hɛn eenya nkitahodzi; na hɛn nkitahodzi no yɛnye Egya no nye ne Ba Jesus Kraest na yɛwɔ

"Dza ofitsi ahyɛse: "Na amandzɛɛ a yɛatse efi ne nkyɛn na yɛbɔ no dawur so kyerɛ hom nye dɛ
dza yɛatse: Nyankopɔn yɛ kan na sum biara nnyi no mu koraa."

"Dza ofitsi ahyɛse: "Sɛ yɛka dɛ yɛnye no wɔ nkitahodzi
"na sɛ yɛnantsew kan mu dɛ mbrɛ ɔno ɔwɔ kan mu no a
dza yɛdze hɛn enyiwa ehu: na ne Ba Jesus Kraest bɔgya no tsew hɛn ho fi bɔn nyina mu."
na nokwar no nnyi hɛn mu."

dza yɛatse: ɔyɛ nokwafo nye tseneneenyi dɛ ɔdze hɛn bɔn bɛkyɛ hɛn
dza yɛdze hɛn enyiwa ehu: na ɔatsew hɛn ho wɔ dza ɔnntsen nyina ho."
na n’asɛm no nnyi hɛn mu."
